Uses of Package
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits

Packages that use oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits
Package
Description
oh_hecc.mvc
Some model-view-controller bits for OH-HECC.
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits
This package contains various objects used within the model that users can see/manipulate/interact with/etc.
  • Classes in oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits used by oh_hecc.mvc
    Class
    Description
    DrawableObjectWithText
    Like DrawableObject but it also has a method for drawing the text of the object.
    DrawablePassageObject
    A drawable interface for the PassageObject.
    ModelButtonObject
    This class basically represents the buttons that will appear across the bottom of the model, allowing the user to do things like access the metadata editing window, add a new passage, save their work, save+quit, etc.
    PassageObject
    ok so basically this represents an EditablePassage object but it's an GUI form instead.
    SelectableObject
    Interface for an object which can be selected/deselected/moved.
    StartHighlightObject
    An object that will be visible behind the starting PassageObject basically as a highlight for it
  • Classes in oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits used by oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits
    Class
    Description
    AbstractObject
    Superclass for all objects in the model.
    ClickableObject
    Interface of objects that can be clicked
    ClickableObjectWithUUID
    Interface for an object that is clickable and has a UUID
    DrawableObject
    Literally just has a `draw(Graphics2D g)` method (used for drawing)
    DrawableObjectWithText
    Like DrawableObject but it also has a method for drawing the text of the object.
    DrawablePassageObject
    A drawable interface for the PassageObject.
    EditModelObject
    This is basically the same as AbstractObject.
    MoveableObject
    An interface for objects that can be moved.
    ObjectWithAPosition
    An interface that literally just has a 'Vector2D getPosition()' method
    ObjectWithAPositionAndUUID
    An interface for an object that has a position and a UUID
    ObjectWithUUID
    Interface for an object that has a UUID
    PassageLinkObject
    Okay so this is basically an object that represents a link from one PassageObject to another.
    ResizeableObject
    An interface for objects that can be resized
    SelectableObject
    Interface for an object which can be selected/deselected/moved.
    StringObject
    An AbstractObject that basically just displays a string (White text with black border) at a given position in the model.
    UpdatableObject
    An interface with an 'update()' method (for objects that are supposed to be updatable).
